episodes.title: RISE TV "ESCAPING A CULT" DOUG SCOTT KRAMER
episodes.description: Follow Us New YouTube https://www.youtube.com/@RISETVCLIPS  𝑻̲̅𝒉̲̅𝒆̲̅ 𝑹̲̅𝑰̲̅𝑺̲̅𝑬̲̅ 𝑪̲̅𝒐̲̅𝒅̲̅𝒆̲̅ 𝑻̲̅𝒉̲̅𝒆̲̅ 𝑩̲̅𝒐̲̅𝒐̲̅𝒌̲̅ 𝒊̲̅𝒔̲̅ 𝒏̲̅𝒐̲̅𝒘̲̅ 𝑨̲̅𝒗̲̅𝒂̲̅𝒊̲̅𝒍̲̅𝒂̲̅𝒃̲̅𝒍̲̅𝒆̲̅ 𝒇̲̅𝒐̲̅𝒓̲̅ 𝑷̲̅𝒓̲̅𝒆̲̅-𝑶̲̅𝒓̲̅𝒅̲̅𝒆̲̅𝒓̲̅! https://risemediatv.com/THERISECODE  Doug Scott Kramer has a channel that takes the viewer on a very personal and intimate journey of what it was like being raised in the Scientology cult - from his father first becoming indoctrinated into it when I was a child, to his own decades-long career as a card-carrying Manchurian Candidate Scientologist - through to his subsequent wake up, escape, and on-going healing process. https://www.youtube.com/@dbnc    RISE Links: https://risemediatv.com https://theriseacademy.locals.com/ Telegram: https://t.me/risevolution https://rumble.com/user/RISEVOLUTION Spotify: https://open.spotify.com/show/2zDYZEEAommJURMd67sfn8  Follow Victoria https://www.tiktok.com/@vicious_shoe817?is_from_webapp=1&sender_device=pc  Manifestation Moment By Jarin Kenyon Jarin Coaching Links Manifestation Coach Cosmic Human Design Coach https://risemediatv.com/coach https://jarinkenyon.com/  The Greg Schumacher Experience Greg Coaching Links Visionary Leadership Coach https://risemediatv.com/coach  ---   Support this podcast: https://podcasters.spotify.com/pod/show/greg-schumacher/support
